hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا الحسن، - يعني ابن علي - حدثنا يحيى بن آدم، حدثنا شريك، بإسناده قال ‏"‏ اجتنبوا ما أسكر ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Sharik through a different chain of narrators. This version has: Avoid that which produces intoxication.
